ValidationRule.description: If Education is selected and Type of education is not blank, and type of education picklist includes conference call,and conference call date of education is blank, make field required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(Education__c = TRUE, RecordType.Name = 'Compliance Case', NOT(ISBLANK( Type_of_Education__c )), INCLUDES(Type_of_Education__c, 'Conference Call'), ISBLANK( Conference_Call_Number_of_Sessions__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Education is checked. Please enter Conference Call Number of Sessions
